description: '''Chief Stephen Osita Osadebe''' {{IPAc-en||audio=Ig-Chief Stephen Osita Osadebe.ogg}}(March 17, 1936 – May 11, 2007), often referred to as just '''Osita Osadebe''', was a Nigerian [[Igbo highlife]] musician from [[Atani]]. During his career spanning over four decades, he became one of the best known musicians of [[Igbo highlife]]. His best-known hit was the 1984 single "[[Osondi Owendi]]", which established him as a leader in the highlife genre and was one of Nigeria's most popular records ever.
